patthana22.5:4.1: Nakusalo nasappaccayo dhammo kusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo ….
patthana22.5:5.1: Nakusalaṃ nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:5.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana22.5:6.1: Nakusalo naanidassano dhammo kusalassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.5:6.3: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate nava.
patthana22.5:7.1: Nakusalaṃ nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:7.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana22.5:8.1: Nakusalaṃ naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:8.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.5:9.1: Nakusalaṃ narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:9.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana22.5:10.1: Nakusalaṃ naarūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:11.1: Nakusalaṃ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:11.3: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana22.5:12.1: Nakusalaṃ nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:12.2: Nakusalaṃ nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:12.4: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana22.5:13.1: Nakusalaṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:13.3: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana22.5:14.1: Nakusalaṃ nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.5:14.3: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate aṭṭhārasa.
